page.title: 01BENTLEY AREA
page.content: Bentley is a village about two and a half miles away from the main town of Doncaster. The main employment comes from a colliery. Just outside Bentley there is a small village called Arksey. In Arksey there is a historic church called the All SAINTS' Parish church. The church is 763 years old.In our area there are a lot of fields which are used for growing crops and grazing land for animals. On the other side of town there is the Wheatley industrial estate.There is a lot of industry there.There is a large chemical works and a firm which makes tractors and other farm machinery. The nearest leisure area to us is Bentley park.It has a large playing field,four tennis courts,two bowling greens and one putting green.
